Text:
""THEY WILL NOT FIT AS IS ON DVDs AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC!!''"

So your rips are larger than what a DVD9 can hold?  Or do you not realize people can buy dual-layer dvd's?
Come on guys! Don't just download and dump it! SEED IT SO I CAN UPLOAD THE NEXT ONE!!
If someone will PLEASE seed this, I will seed it indefinitely myself upon completion!
